programme.title: My Life at Easter with Sally Phillips S1 (2/2)
programme.desc: Sally Philips meets the Rt Rev Rose Hudson-Wilkin to discover what Easter means to her.

programme.title: Wild Isles (Grasslands) S1 (3/5)
programme.desc: «Grasslands»David Attenborough explores our grasslands and reveals extraordinary wildlife stories.

programme.title: This is BBC Two
programme.desc: Highlights of programmes on BBC Two.

programme.title: Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Caroline Hawley heads to the Antiques, Vintage and Collectors Fair in Detling, Kent. With expert help on hand from Tim Weeks and Nick Hall, the red and blue teams go head-to-head to see who can buy the most profitable three items to take to auction. Meanwhile, Caroline has that shrinking feeling as she visits Bekonscot, the oldest model village in the world.

programme.title: The Bidding Room S4 (19/30)
programme.desc: Five dealers bid to buy a toy tugboat, a wooden mask and a pair of funfair dolphins.

programme.title: Rick Stein's Cornwall S3 (5/15)
programme.desc: Rick uncovers the story of Cornwall's ancient capital and fishes under sail for oysters.

programme.title: Weatherman Walking: The Welsh Coast (Ynyslas to Aberystwyth, Cardigan Bay) (5/8)
programme.desc: «Ynyslas to Aberystwyth, Cardigan Bay»Weatherman Derek Brockway walks from Ynyslas to Aberystwyth, Cardigan Bay.

programme.title: Nicky Campbell BBC News Talk
programme.desc: Nicky Campbell takes your calls on the day's talking points, hearing views and experiences from across the UK. Call 08085 909693 between 9am and 11am on weekdays (calls are free from mobiles and landlines).

programme.title: Morning Session
programme.desc: Live coverage from the Crucible Theatre in Sheffield.

programme.title: Politics Live
programme.desc: The big political issues of the day.

programme.title: Afternoon Session
programme.desc: Live coverage from the Crucible Theatre in Sheffield.

programme.title: Richard Osman's House of Games S5
programme.desc: Every day this week, celebrity contestants Ruby Bhogal, Ed Byrne, Ingrid Oliver and Sir Matthew Pinsent take on a series of quiz rounds selected by the host, quiz legend Richard Osman. A daily winner is declared following a quick-fire round at the end of each show, and the scores are tallied across the week, resulting in an overall champion being crowned on Friday. Will the winning stars opt for the much-coveted House of Games decanter, or will they be tempted by the House of Games kitchen composter?

programme.title: B&B By the Sea (Shirley Ballas) S1 (6/15)
programme.desc: «Shirley Ballas»Strictly Come Dancing head judge Shirley Ballas is kept on her toes by the B&B team.

programme.title: Between the Covers S6 (6/6)
programme.desc: Sara is joined by Laura Whitmore, Meera Syal, Gethin Jones and Joe Thomas.

programme.title: Saving Lives at Sea S4 (n°9)
programme.desc: The crews race to rescue a shark attack victim and two boys being swept far out to sea.

programme.title: Mastermind
programme.desc: Clive Myrie presents the last semi-final of the classic quiz where contenders return to the black chair under the glare of the spotlight and the ticking clock to win a place in the grand final. The specialist subjects are Sir Edwin Lutyens, Coldplay, the Karen Pirie novels of Val McDermid and the films of Terry Gilliam.

programme.title: University Challenge
programme.desc: The second round of quarter-finals concludes with an elimination match. Two teams return having lost their first quarter-finals; a second loss here means they leave the competition. Jeremy Paxman asks the questions.

programme.title: Storyville (Deborah James: Bowelbabe In Her Own Words)
programme.desc: «Deborah James: Bowelbabe In Her Own Words»Deborah James's extraordinary cancer journey, told with her own and her family's archive.

programme.title: Live At the Apollo Bites S15
programme.desc: Featuring Kiri Pritchard-McLean, Stephen Bailey and Desiree Burch.

programme.title: Newsnight
programme.desc: The day's important national and international news stories. With Faisal Islam.

programme.title: Day 3
programme.desc: Highlights from day three at the 2023 World Snooker Championship.
